201.title: Created
201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created.

204.title: No Content
204.description: The server successfully processed the request, but is not returning any content.

400.title: Bad Request
400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: The server understood the request, but refuses to authorize it.

404.title: Not Found
404.description: The requested resource could not be found.

405.title: Method Not Allowed
405.description: The method specified in the request is not allowed for the resource.

409.title: Conflict
409.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

500.title: Internal Server Error.
500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.description: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and received an invalid response from the upstream server.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overloading or maintenance.
